timeline.bodyText: since the java15-app uses preview features, we will want to cap this test to Java 15 using @MaximumJavaLevel
timeline.author: aguibert

timeline.bodyText: is this source URL correct? If it's in your personal github fork, we can just point it to your fork+branch
timeline.author: aguibert

replies.bodyText: I have updated the URL to my personal github fork.
